reviews.text: just returned from our 4th trip to Orlando (our first stay at the Hampton Inn) excellent hotel, the best we've stayed in, good location, fantastic free breakfast, standards throughout the hotel were very high, would definitely be my first choice next time we visit Orlando.
reviews.title: fantastic hotel!

reviews.text: Business stay requiring proximity to the Convention Center. This hotel is within reasonable walking distance. The hotel was in good condition. No complaints at all. Not a long walk over to many restaurants on International Drive and walking at night in October is quite pleasant. I would stay here again if I have business at the Convention Center. It was interesting to see that the hotel is very popular with European and Aussie families.
reviews.title: Convenient to Convention Center

reviews.text: i needed a place to stay for one night on my trip and came across a great price online.after reading the reviews I booked it.
reviews.title: ok stay

likes.disliked: — small beds and pool closed to early

reviews.title: Excellent Hotel
reviews.text: Upon arrival everyone was nice and informative.We recieved our room immediatly.Even though it was not on the first floor as i requested.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived in our roon my first thought was "omg these beds are small!" I was told 2 queen size and they were full/double. Every thing was clean and in order.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hampton Inn Pointe Orlando / Convention Center really is a great hotel, Ideal for Couples for Families with older children.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel in Orlando.
Away from the hustle and bustle
reviews.text: Nice big rooms and very clean, good size bathrooms too.
Good location on Universal Blvd, just 5 min walk to I Drive. The whole area felt safe, even walking at night.
reviews.title: Fantastic - again!!

reviews.text: Its on south I drive and has a more upmarket feel than the north.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.text: Lots of nice places to eat withing walking distance: Bahama Breeze, TGI's, Tony Romas, Olive Garden, Dennys and all the places in Poine Orlando.
reviews.title: Friendly staff

likes.disliked: — no free shuttles to theme parks

reviews.text: OVERVIEW: Business trip travel that was solid and convenient to the convention center.
reviews.title: 2nd stay as good as the first - Recommendable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: LOCATION: On the "other side" of the main strip that surrounds the convention center, this property is close to all the restaurants and attractions of International Blvd. Many families going to the amusement parks were staying here, whereas I was here for a business conference at the convention center - so it's apparently pretty central for many reasons. It's about 15 minutes to the airport.
reviews.title: Good all- rounder, away from the I-Drive crowds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: HOTEL: Several stories with plenty of free-parking, this is a standard Hampton Inn. Check-in was smooth and service was generally good. The property is well-maintained. The pool was heated (earlier than advertised) and well taken care of. The breakfast area is large and the food service was good. There are 3 elevators, but I found myself taking the stairs rather than waiting (there always seemed to be a long wait - don't know why).
reviews.title: Great Location and Good Value for Money

reviews.text: ROOM: (#425) Large, comfortable and clean. Great water pressure in the shower and plenty of hot water. Internet was free and worked well. Coffee maker was "one cup at a time", since I was alone this wasn't an issue. View of parking lots, but that's pretty much all there was to look at for most hotels in the area.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: RECOMMENDATION: Perfect for the business traveler going to the convention center. Good for families too based on all the families who were there and looking happy. Perhaps not a good 'singles' hotel or 'couples' experience.
reviews.title: Great value hotel with ideal location

reviews.text: The Hampton has always been a good hotel chain, and this trip showed the Hampton at its best! It was a nice hotel, clean rooms. We were there to go to The Capital One Bowl and to visit Orlando. It had a very nice mini-golf place nearby and the main parks, (Disney, Universal, Sea World) were only a short car trip away.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: This was such a highly rated TripAdvior choice we had to try it for a business trip.
reviews.title: Above average staff friendliness. Below average cleanliness.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: THE GOOD: The fastest check-in I think we have ever experienced in our life. Super friendly staff. Good central location in a safe neighborhood. Hot breakfast was average. Egg & cheese omlet one day, hot (kinda just warm borderline cold) waffles and keilbasa the next. Breakfast buffet immaculate and well stocked and manned.
reviews.title: Excellent!

likes.liked: — The pool and the king bed
likes.disliked: — The hotel sits near an empty field, while still surrounded by so many other hotels

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: THE BAD AND THE UGLY: Bathroom cleanliness was not acceptable. The toilet seat was raised upon arrival. (Bad sign.) When I put the seat down, it had small,brown smears on it. Sink countertop had dried water drips on it that smeared off. YUCK!!!! Normally would have complained or changed rooms. But due to a hurried schedule, had to rush out to an appointment. So just decided to buy disinfecting wipes at the local grocery store, only a short drive away. Figured doing it myself would ensure a clean bathroom. (Switching rooms wouldn't necessarily be cleaner....maybe just appear that way.)
reviews.title: Air Con By Harley Davidson

reviews.text: The short of it. We got a dirty bathroom. Surely all of the bathrooms in this hotel could not be as bad as what we got. But traveler beware....bring some Chlorox wipes just to be sure!
reviews.title: Adequate, but overrated
